control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of information stored on digital media during transport outside of controlled areas.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs a detonation chamber capability within [Assignment: organization-defined information system, system component, or location].

Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of information stored on digital media during transport outside of controlled areas.
